phosphorous_acid.note: Phosphonate-based fungicide stimulating host plant defense. Excellent tank-mix partner. Safe on all turf including putting greens.

dithiopyr.note: Pre + early post activity on crabgrass up to 1-tiller. Safe on established bentgrass at reduced rates. Industry-leading pre-emergent.

mesotrione.note: Safe at seeding, causes temporary bleaching

glyphosate.note: NON-SELECTIVE. Only for renovation, dormant bermuda transition, spot treatment. NEVER for general weed control on active turf.

2_4_d.note: Broadleaf herbicide ONLY. NOT a fungicide.

indaziflam.note: Longest residual pre-emergent. WARM-SEASON TURF ONLY. NOT safe on cool-season.

quinclorac.note: XLR8 cation formulation for faster uptake. Use with MSO. NOT SAFE on St. Augustine, centipede, bahia, or dichondra.

fenoxaprop.note: Cool-season turf only. Do NOT apply above 85F.

pendimethalin.note: AquaCap microencapsulated formulation reduces staining. Can be applied over ornamentals.

isoxaben.note: Broadleaf pre-emergent only. Does NOT control grassy weeds. Industry standard for pre-emergent broadleaf control. Excellent tank-mix partner with grass pre-emergents.

isoxaben_trifluralin.hrac_class: Cellulose biosynthesis inhibitor + Microtubule assembly inhibitor
isoxaben_trifluralin.note: Granular combination for ornamental beds and landscape areas. Controls broadleaf and grassy weeds.

bentazon.note: Contact activity on nutsedge. Multiple applications typically needed.

fluroxypyr.note: Corteva post-emergent broadleaf herbicide. Excellent selectivity on cool and warm-season turf. Superior on clover, ground ivy, wild violet.

clopyralid.note: Corteva post-emergent. Excellent on leguminous weeds. Very low use rates. Do not use treated clippings in compost.

triclopyr_turf.note: Corteva-originated active. Excellent on tough broadleaf weeds. Can injure cool-season grasses at high rates. Do not apply to bentgrass greens.

dimethenamid_p_pendimethalin.note: Dual mode of action pre-emergent granule. Excellent for ornamental beds and landscape.

prodiamine_isoxaben.hrac_class: Microtubule assembly inhibitor + Cellulose biosynthesis inhibitor
prodiamine_isoxaben.note: Combination granular pre-emergent. Extended residual from prodiamine. Primarily for ornamental beds and landscapes.

triclopyr_fluroxypyr_various.note: Safe for St. Augustine and centipede

2_4_d_dicamba_quinclorac.note: 3-way herbicide: 2,4-D + dicamba + quinclorac. Broadleaf + grassy weed control.

s_metolachlor.note: Pre-emergent for nutsedge and annual grasses. Apply before weed emergence.

dicamba_prodiamine.note: Combination pre/post-emergent herbicide for warm-season turf.

trifloxysulfuron_halosulfuron.note: Warm-season turf only. Dual ALS inhibitor for enhanced sedge control.

imidacloprid.note: Water in 0.5 inch immediately. Pollinator concern.

bifenthrin.note: Do NOT water in for surface feeders. NOT effective for disease control.

chlorpyrifos.note: Being phased out due to EPA restrictions

indoxacarb.note: Reduced-risk insecticide. Excellent caterpillar activity. Low toxicity to beneficial insects. 4-hour REI.

mineral_oil.note: Horticultural oil, physical mode of action

cyclobutrifluram.note: New Syngenta nematicide (SDHI-like). Apply preventively, water in.

cyclobutrifluram_abamectin.note: Combination nematicide for enhanced spectrum and residual control.

cyclobutrifluram_fluopyram.note: Combination nematicide with fast knockdown plus residual.

in2care_beauveria.note: Biological mosquito control using Beauveria bassiana fungus. Trap-based system.

trinexapac_ethyl.note: Primary PGR for growth regulation. NOT a fungicide or herbicide.

paclobutrazol.note: Stronger Poa suppression than Primo. Affects roots and shoots.

flurprimidol.type: Type II PGR - GA biosynthesis inhibitor (early pathway)
flurprimidol.note: Early-pathway GA inhibitor (Type II). Provides Poa annua suppression in bentgrass. Enhances shade tolerance. Often tank-mixed with Primo MAXX. Also labeled for ornamental and tree growth regulation.

ethephon.note: Seedhead suppression on Poa annua. Often tank-mixed with Primo.

trinexapac_ethyl_prohexadione.note: Combination PGR with trinexapac-ethyl + prohexadione-calcium for extended growth regulation.
